instructions: Tap the camera on the Home screen. Live video should play automatically. Swipe through the timeline at the bottom of the screen to browse recorded clips. Tap a clip to play it. Pinch the clip open left and right to show the timeline, then drag to go forward or back through the video. Tap Live to switch back to live video.
Tap the Home tab, then tap the Add and Edit Home button . Below the People heading, tap a person. Tap Cameras, then choose an option.
